name: Restricting the bookmarking of more than 3 attestations
scenarioId: android/New_version_of_the_wallet_UI_UX_2/View_Document_Redesign_114/viewDocument:Restricting the bookmarking of more than 3 attestations
methodName: Restricting the bookmarking of more than 3 attestations

testSteps.description: Given the user is registered to a valid EUDI Wallet on their mobile device
And attestations are issued in the EUDI Wallet
Given the user has three bookmarked attestations
When the user tries to bookmark another attestation
Then the bookmark icon should be disabled
And the user should be informed that only up to three attestations can be bookmarked

userStory.storyName: Viewing and managing attestations in the EUDI Wallet
userStory.displayName: Viewing and managing attestations in the EUDI Wallet
userStory.narrative:
As a EUDI Wallet User
  I want to be able to view my attestations issued in the EUDI Wallet
  So that I can review the details of my issued attestation

title: Restricting the bookmarking of more than 3 attestations
